result.title: bettercodes.org now online // we need your participation
result.content:
Dear coders,
 

We have  just released the initial beta version of our community platform for coders, programmers and developers. Although there are still a lot of bugs we have decided to open our platform to you. While we are working very hard to fix the open issues as soon as possible we believe that your feedback and your help will be essential in improving what we believe is a great platform. A platform and community for the most talented programmers, coders and developers in the world - YOU!

 

We believe that a specialized network with dedicated features and functions for the needs of coders makes a lot of sense. We have built the community based on a pure OPEN SOURCE model and bettercodes.org is and will be FREE OF CHARGE. After fixing some major bugs, we will RELEASE OUR SOURCE CODE. We invite you and all other coders around the globe to share our vision, help to create new plug-ins and make bettercodes.org the most thrilling network and collaboration platform for coders.

 

Test and start to use it, go to: http://www.bettercodes.org and register.

 

See you at bettercodes.org!

Your bettercodes team
